channel.title: Random NPC drops Advanced help please!
channel.description:
When i kill any NPC's in my server (Defaultscape V2) it drops random stuff!! Every single mob! From jad to lvl 2 men...
Ive looked in my NPCDrop.cfg file and theres nothing there! Completely empty!!
Please help then i can get on with my development!!
Regards ~Johno

item.title: Random NPC drops Advanced help please!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Any ideas for a bud free blank source?

Read full topic
item.source: Random NPC drops Advanced help please!

item.title: Random NPC drops Advanced help please!
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

You change the NPC drops using the NPCHandler class. The NPCDrops.cfg file doesn’t work.

–I suggest using a different base.

Read full topic
item.source: Random NPC drops Advanced help please!
